channel.title: SoftLayer_Account_Attribute on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Account_Attribute on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Account_Attribute
item.description: SoftLayer_Account_Attribute Datatype Description Many SoftLayer customer accounts have individual attributes assigned to them that describe features or special features for that account, such as special pricing, account statuses, and ordering instructions. The SoftLayer_Account_Attribute data type contains information relating to a single SoftLayer_Account attribute. Local accountAttributeTypeId The internal identifier of the type of attribute that a SoftLayer customer account attribute belongs to. Type: integer
